summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Video OCR app - all core features working correctly. Fixed critical OCR integration bug and verified end-to-end functionality.
passed_tests: API Root endpoint (200 OK)
Video upload endpoint with valid MP4 files
Video processing job creation
Job status tracking and polling
Error handling for invalid file types and intervals
Job listing and deletion
Frontend UI loads correctly with all panels
Upload dropzone displays and functions properly
Frame interval selector works (0.5s-3s options)
Process button correctly disabled without video
Transcript output area shows proper empty state
Copy and export buttons hidden when no transcript
API connectivity from frontend to backend
Responsive design adapts to mobile viewport
Keyboard navigation functionality
Accessibility features present
Good page load performance (<3s)
OCR processing with GPT-4o vision model
Background job processing with progress tracking
Timestamped transcript generation
